name: Penguin Run (itch) (DrRin)
description: A infinite-runner created to StareOutGames Hypercasual GameJam #1, you control a penguin turn the mobile to sides to move him, your objective is go the most far as possible, but be carefull with the obstacules. Also you can use the fishcoins, to buy new hats to your penguin. Play and have fun.
